practice_phrases.known: 我想认识会说英语的人
practice_phrases.target: I want to meet people who speak English

practice_phrases.known: 因为我正在尝试学英语
practice_phrases.target: because I'm trying to learn English

practice_phrases.known: 我正在尝试尽可能经常地说英语
practice_phrases.target: I'm trying to speak English as often as possible
